entries.name: Adventuring Gear
entries.description: Adventuring gear is a collection of useful mundane items such as chalk, poles,  pikes, ropes, etc. When you rummage through your adventuring gear for some useful mundane item, you find what you need and mark off a use.

entries.name: Anti-Toxin
entries.description: When you drink this antitoxin you're cured of one poison affecting you.

entries.name: Bag of Books
entries.description: When your bag of books contains just the right book for the subject you're Spouting Lore on, consult the book, mark off a use, and take +1 to your roll.

entries.name: Bandages
entries.description: When you have a few minutes to bandage someone else’s wounds, heal them of 4 damage and expend a use.

entries.name: Dwarven Hardtack
entries.description: Dwarves say it tastes like home. Everyone else says it tastes like home, if home is a hog farm, and on fire.

entries.name: Elven Bread
entries.description: Only the greatest of elf-friends are treated to this rare delicacy.

entries.name: Halfling Pipeleaf
entries.description: When you share halfling pipeleaf with someone, expend two uses and take +1 forward to parley with them.

entries.name: Healing Potion
entries.description: When you drink an entire healing potion; heal yourself for 10 damage or remove a debility, your choice.

entries.name: Keg of Dwarven Stout
entries.description: When you open a keg of dwarven stout and let everyone drink freely, take +1 to your Carouse roll. If you drink a whole keg yourself, you are very, very drunk.

entries.name: Poultices and Herbs
entries.description: When you carefully treat someone’s wounds with poultices and herbs, heal them of 7 damage and expend a use.
